product_name: Switch Axo Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The men's Switch Axo Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses are sculpted to fit and feel great, while protecting your eyes. Axo comes with 1 pair of polarized gray and 1 pair of rose-tinted lenses. Frames and lenses use high-energy, embedded magnets for powerful magnetic attraction between the lens and frame. Frames are made with tough, thermoplastic nylon to withstand active use. Polarized gray lenses block 100% UV and are excellent for bright conditions, whether it's alpine, desert, snow, beach or water sports. Gray lenses have a thin-film coating that resists scratching and causes water to bead up and roll off. The rose-amber lenses are designed for low-light conditions. Switch Axo Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses come with a hard case, soft microfiber cleaning pouch, and a hard-sided lens pod for storage.
short_description: The men's Switch Axo Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses are sculpted to fit and feel great, while protecting your eyes. Axo comes with 1 pair of polarized gray and 1 pair of rose-tinted lenses.
